column8:
Margaret Thatcher is one of very few politicians worth admiring. In a world of political and fiscal incompetence, we mourn the passing of her kind. Someone more concerned with making hard choices rather than politically expedient ones.

This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: "People think that at the top there isn't much room. They tend to think of it as an Everest. My message is that there is tons of room at the top."
column21: This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: "People think that at the top there isn't much room. They tend to think of it as an Everest. My message is that there is tons of room at the top." A t shirt from a series to be found at weadmire.net.
